name: v3.2.2
body:
### Enhancements

- #960 - Support route naming and generating URLs based on route names
- #176 - Suggestion: add before hook in echo.Response?
- #985 - Expose group.add() method for dynamic route registration
- Changed default log level to `ERROR`

### Bug Fixes

- #963 - Static middleware with html5 enabled breaks all other declared routes
- #444 - gzip middleware fails with Content-Length header
- #831 - Invoke some callbacks before Write Header (for middleware)
- #968 - Fix issue with JWT race
- #966 - Use the NotFoundHandler when a file haven't been found
- #980 - Slice don't bind the route parameter
- #993 - fix build constraint go1.8
- #992 - check proxy skipper before proceeding

name: v3.2.1
body: Missed version label in the banner

name: v3.2.0
body:
### New Features

- Automatically use JSONPretty/XMLPretty if `?pretty` in the query string (#916)
- Middleware
   - `Casbin` https://echo.labstack.com/middleware/casbin-auth
   - `Proxy` https://echo.labstack.com/middleware/proxy
   - `BodyDump` https://echo.labstack.com/middleware/body-dump
- `Context#IsWebSocket()` method to check if connection is a WebSocket

### Enhancements

- Add pointer binding of proper types to DefaultBinder (#915)
- Add cookie tag for logger (#921)
- Reduced package dependencies by separating website and cookbook from the main repo to https://github.com/labstack/echox
- Option to hide startup banner (#928)
- KeyAuthValidator should return error as last item (#938)
- Updated `Context#Scheme` to include more XFF headers (353a2f8b78ae77002b26b96748d83f0199a79a45)


### Bug Fixes

- Debug mode not setting log level to debug (#925)
- Files system traversal bug (#947)
- [Regression] Path parameters with query escaped value were broken (#948)
- Routing behavior (#954)

### New Recipes

- Load balancing (https://echo.labstack.com/cookbook/load-balancing)
- Reverse proxy (https://echo.labstack.com/cookbook/reverse-proxy)

### Miscellaneous 

- Dropped support for Go 1.6
- Using `httptest` in test cases
- Official repo for community contributions https://github.com/labstack/echo-contrib
- Forum to ask questions https://forum.labstack.com

name: v3.1.0
body:
# Change Log

## [v3.1.0](https://github.com/labstack/echo/tree/v3.1.0) (2017-04-26)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/labstack/echo/compare/v3.0.3...v3.1.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Context\#RealIP\(\) to fetch the first IP [\#914](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/914)
- Implement request ID middleware [\#913](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/913)
- Implement key based authentication middleware  [\#912](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/912)
- Pretty print error on debug mode [\#111](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/111)
- How to make Echo support media type `text/xml` ? [\#864](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/864)
- Setting "Debug = true" no longer passes errors to client [\#817](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/817)
- Server has output not produced by logger [\#813](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/813)
- Uncentralized output makes integration complicated [\#798](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/798)
- Unexposed graceful server causes integration issues [\#797](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/797)
- how to prevent unescape path in v3.0.3? [\#766](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/766)
- Improvement suggestion: Support a Scanner interface for Bindings [\#763](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/763)
- Could you provider an option to use c.JSON as pretty output [\#762](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/762)
- Can we make Graceful's ShutdownInitiated property public? [\#752](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/752)
- Make bearer string customizable, such as "Token"? [\#750](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/750)
- Suggest: How to Use Custom Binder [\#438](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/438)
- Form validate feature request.. [\#305](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/305)
- Will it include validation? [\#298](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/298)
- logger: Don't copy lock value in LoggerConfig.pool, use a pointer [\#825](https://github.com/labstack/echo/pull/825) ([pdf](https://github.com/pdf))
- Support BindUnmarshaler for basic types [\#786](https://github.com/labstack/echo/pull/786) ([flimzy](https://github.com/flimzy))
- Gannett digital master allow html buffers [\#765](https://github.com/labstack/echo/pull/765) ([vishr](https://github.com/vishr))

**Fixed bugs:**

- Gzip with streaming \(Flushing\) [\#873](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/873)
- Fixed skipper for static middleware [\#896](https://github.com/labstack/echo/pull/896) ([Michsior14](https://github.com/Michsior14))
- Change to middleware.LoggerConfig broke my service [\#821](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/821)
- fix imports for twitter example [\#811](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/811)
- Failure to provide a csrf token in a form results in error 500 [\#802](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/802)
- context.Path\(\) isn't properly set for routes that don't exist [\#794](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/794)
- send NoContent\(code\) whit Gzip middleware!!! [\#781](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/781)
- Content-Encoding: gzip header should not be sent when HTTP 204 [\#489](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/489)
- Fix binding of untagged struct fields [\#812](https://github.com/labstack/echo/pull/812) ([flimzy](https://github.com/flimzy))

**Closed issues:**

- How to bind ajax post data? [\#907](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/907)
- "Invalid csrf token" for POST Request [\#904](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/904)
- Twitter Cookbook is missing source code of server.go [\#901](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/901)
- 能否支持下NoRoute设置 [\#900](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/900)
- package context: unrecognized import path "context" [\#899](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/899)
- JWT with RS256 not Working for me [\#897](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/897)
- dVentures34 [\#889](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/889)
- url\_for equivalent in templates [\#884](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/884)
- Is there any plan to support "binding" struct tag for Bind\(\) method? [\#872](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/872)
- the router rule is wrong ? [\#869](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/869)
- Echo\#Group Bug [\#857](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/857)
- Static files. Spaces in path. [\#839](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/839)
- Redirects [\#833](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/833)
- HTML5 mode in v3 [\#748](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/748)
- Is it possible to prevent c.Request\(\).Body from containing the Auth Header?  [\#196](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/196)
- Use rsa pub and private keys for jwt [\#866](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/866)
-  ERR\_CONTENT\_LENGTH\_MISMATCH [\#853](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/853)
- \[URGENT\] Echo GAE problems [\#824](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/824)
- graceful  beforeshutdown  [\#816](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/816)
- Can't register a custom validator using Echo\#Validator [\#815](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/815)
- Echo compression and WOFF2 font causing ERR\_CONTENT\_LENGTH\_MISMATCH [\#806](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/806)
- Logger does not implement Logger  [\#804](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/804)
-  version 3.0.3 not support gracehttp [\#791](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/791)

name: v3.0.3
body:
- Fixed #755 
- Using `https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/crypto/acme/autocert` for auto TLS, which changed the start auto TLS function to `StartAutoTLS(address string) error`

name: v3.0.2
body: https://github.com/labstack/echo/compare/v3.0.1...v3.0.2

name: v3.0.1
body: Fixed #729 (Routing bug)

name: v3.0.0
body:
# [Echo v3](https://echo.labstack.com)

### Change Log
- Automatic TLS certificates via [Let's Encrypt](https://letsencrypt.org/)
- Built-in support for graceful shutdown
- Utility functions to wrap standard handler and middleware
- `Map` type as shorthand for `map[string]interface{}`
- Context now wraps standard net/http Request and Response
- New configuration
  - `Echo#ShutdownTimeout`
  - `Echo#DisableHTTP2`
- New API
  - `Echo#Start()`
  - `Echo#StartTLS()`
  - `Echo#StartAutoTLS()`
  - `Echo#StartServer()`
  - `Echo#Shutdown()`
  - `Echo#ShutdownTLS()`
  - `Context#Scheme()`
  - `Context#RealIP()`
  - `Context#IsTLS()`
- Exposed the following properties instead of setter / getter functions on `Echo` instance:
  - `Binder`
  - `Renderer`
  - `HTTPErrorHandler`
  - `Debug`
  - `Logger`
- Enhanced redirect and CORS middleware
- Dropped static middleware in favor of `Echo#Static`
- Dropped API
  - `Echo#Run()`
  - `Context#P()`
- Dropped standard `Context` support 
- Dropped support for `fasthttp`
- Dropped deprecated API
- Moved `Logger` interface to root level
- Moved website and recipes to the main repo
- Updated docs and fixed numerous issues

### [Learn More](https://github.com/labstack/echo/issues/665)

name: v2.2.0
body: Final v2.x release from master

name: v1.4.3

name: Echo v2.1
body:
- Fixed bugs in JWT and CSRF middleware
  - #597
  - #601
  - #584
  - #600
- Ability to skip a middleware via `Skipper` function https://echo.labstack.com/middleware/overview#skipping-middleware
- Function to fetch RealIP in `engine.Request`
- Function to fetch RealIP
- Fixed HTTP2 TLS config
- Function to close listener `Echo#Stop()`
- Set of new redirect middleware https://echo.labstack.com/middleware/redirect
- Renamed `Context#Context` => `Context#StdContext` & `Context#SetContext` => `Context#SetStdContext`
- #576 fasthttp fix setting cookie value
- #577 Context.Bind does not recover from panic
- #579 fix panic in form binding
- #574 Conext.Bind() can not bind GET method queryParams
- #587 Escaped forward slashes in path parameter
- #604 Custom header is overwritten by c.JSON
- #605 Do not set DEBUG log level in Echo.SetDebug(false)
- #608 [Urgent] HTTP connection hangs when using HEAD method
- #622 Group middleware not applied to Static or File routes
- #610, #611 Enhanced JSON error reporting in binder
- #629 fix import path, ipfans -> labstack
- #364 Disabling the default logger.
- #626 the context package has been moved from the x/net repository to the standard library as the context package
- #625 Support Go v1.7 
- #632 Enhance JWT Middleware with custom claims struct
- #633JWT middleware: support RS256 algorithm
- #637 Inline feature
- #589 JWT middleware: support for accessing token from cookie
- #591 Read token from cookie in JWT middleware
- #525, #566, #573, #653 [Proposal] Improve Context Response Options for Speed and Usability
- #655 New Function `Engine#Close`
- #657, #647, #656 Potential concurrent access panic in middleware.JWT
- #663 Fixed typo

name: 2.0.0-alpha
v1.3
body:
### Echo v1.3

[Website](http://labstack.com/echo)
[Godoc](https://godoc.org/github.com/labstack/echo)
- Support for `golang.org/x/net/context`
- Logging with option to set prefix, output and levels.
  - `Echo#SetLogPrefix()`
  - `Echo#SetLogOutput()`
  - `Echo#SetLogLevel()`
- `Echo#Hook` Registers a callback to alter request/response objects even before it hits the router or any middleware.
  - `Echo#Hook()`
- `Echo#AutoIndex()` - Enables/disables automatically creating an index page for the directory.
- `Context#Path()` - Returns the registered path for a handler, it can be used in the middleware for logging purpose.
- `Context#JSONIndent()` - JSON response with indentation.
- `Context#XMLIndent` - XML response with indentation.
- `Context#Echo()` - Returns the `Echo` instance.
- Dropped API
  - `Echo#StripTrailingSlash()` - Use `Echo#Hook()`
- Refactored API
  - `Context#String()` - Dropped Printf, an option argument.
  - `Context#HTML()` - Dropped Printf, an optional argument.
- Recipes
  - http://labstack.com/echo/recipes/embed-resources
- Community Packages
  - [dpecho](https://github.com/deferpanic/dpecho)
  - [echosentry](https://github.com/01walid/echosentry)
- Updated docs
- Closed many PRs and issues (https://github.com/labstack/echo/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3).

name: v1.2.0
body:
- New API
  - `Echo.Any`  - Any adds a route > handler to the router for all HTTP methods.
  - `Echo.Match` - Match adds a route > handler to the router for multiple HTTP methods provided.
  - `Response.Committed` - Getter function for committed status. 
  - `Context.File` - Sends response as file with option to download as attachment.
  - `Context.JSONP` - JSONP sends a JSONP response with status code. It uses `callback` to construct the JSONP payload.
- Dropped API
  - `RedirectToSlash` middleware
- Refactored API
  - `Echo.Debug`
  - `Echo.SetDebug`
  - `StripTrailingSlash` middleware moved to `Echo.StripTrailingSlash`
- Enhancements
  - Added `sync.Pool` to gzip middleware #200 
  - Print IP address in logger middleware #212
  - Moved examples to recipes
  - Added new recipes
    - [JSONP](labstack.com/echo/recipes/jsonp)
  - [Google App Engine](http://labstack.com/echo/recipes/google-app-engine)
  - New [website](http://labstack.com/echo)
  - Updated docs
- Closed the following issues
  - #143 
  - #149
  - #151
  - #162
  - #165
  - #188
  - #180
  - #228
  - #225
  - #222
  - #178
  - #219
  - #218
  - #210 
  - #207
  - #184

name: v1.1.0
body:
- New APIs
  - `Echo.Server` - Returns the internal *http.Server
  - `Context.Query` - Read query param
  - `Context.Form` - Read form param
  - `Context.XML` - Sends an application/xml response
  - `Echo.ColoredLog` - Enable/Disable colored log
- `Context.Bind` now supports XML
-  Removed JWT middleware library
- Issues fixed
  - #109
  - #118
  - #131
  - #135
  - #137
  - #141
- Recipes
  - [File Upload](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/file-upload)
  - [Streaming File Upload](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/streaming-file-upload)
  - [Streaming Response](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/streaming-response)
  - [WebSocket](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/websocket)
  - [Subdomains](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/subdomains)
  - [JWT Authentication](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/jwt-authentication)
  - [Graceful Shutdown](http://echo.labstack.com/recipes/graceful-shutdown)

name: Production ready
body:
- New API
  - `ServeDir` - ServeDir serves files from a directory
  - `DefaultHTTPErrorHandler` - Invokes the default HTTP error handler
- Improved router performance
- More test coverage
- Fixed issues
  - #37
  - #71
  - #77
  - #86
  - #91
  - #95
  - #96
  - #100
  - #103
- Examples
  - Steaming response
- New URL for the website http://echo.labstack.com

name: Group separated from Echo
body:
- Better handling for WebSocket in middleware
- Separated Group from Echo to limit API
- Updated docs

name: Encapsulation
body: Encapsulated `Context`'s fields and exposed them via public functions.

name: Echo.HandlerFunc changed
body: `Echo.HandlerFunc` changed from `func (*Context) *HTTPError` to `func (*Context) error`

name: Smashing new features
body:
- Added following middleware
  - Panic recover
  - Basic auth
  - Strip trailing slash
  - Redirect to slash 
  - Gzip
- Support to serve favicon
- Enhanced priority in router
- Wrapped `Flush`, `Hijack` and `CloseNotify` functions in response.
- Fixed issues: #51, #53, #57, #63, #65, #67, #68
- Dropped `NotFoundHandler` in favor of `HTTPErrorHandler`

name: Centralized HTTP error handling
body:
- Centralized HTTP error handling http://labstack.github.io/echo/guide/#error-handling
  - Default handler function changed from `func(*Context) error` to `func(*Context) *echo.HTTPError`.
  - Most of the response helper functions now return `*echo.HTTPError` http://labstack.github.io/echo/guide/#response
- Fixed issues #46, #49 and #50.
- Added `echo.HandlerFunc` to the list of supported handlers.
- More documentation.

name: v0.0.11
body:
- Support for func(http.Handler) http.Handler middleware
- Support for echo.HandlerFunc handler
- Middleware in a separate package
- Reverse route lookup using echo.URI
- Improved website/documentation
- Fixed issues
  - #32
  - #40
  - #44

- Moved middleware package to root
- HandlerFunc signature change to `func(*Context) error`
- Support for handlers which return error for central error handling
- Introduced centralized HTTP error handler
- New website for the project
- Dropped support for `func(http.Handler) http.Handler` middleware

- Smartly prioritize conflicting routes, write in any order. Resolved like below:
  - /users/new
  - /users/:id
  - /users/*
- Custom Render and Bind functions
- Enhanced sub routes / groups
- Stability
Includes sub router API.
